background: part of a scene behind objects
bring: be sold for a certain price
club: stout stick that is larger at one end
deport: hand over to the authorities of another country
doctor: Dr., person who holds Ph.D. degree
foot: linear unit of length equal to 12 inches
hand: cards held in a game by a player
head: body part
chief
top dog
person who is in charge
headline: newspaper headline
key: list of words that explain symbols
mature: fully developed and ready to be eaten
mind: what is responsible for one's thoughts and feelings
minute: unit of time equal to 60 seconds
mountain: land mass projecting above its surroundings
name: person's reputation
neck: connection from head to the rest of the body
old: having lived for a relatively long time
pit: hard inner core of some fruits
program: series of steps to be carried
question: inquiry
query
interrogation
interrogate
reward: money for helping to find criminals
scene: unit of action in a film
skin: body covering of a living animal
sleeve: part of a garment that is attached at armhole
speaker: talker
utterer
loudspeaker
speaker unit
stage: distinct time period in a sequence of events
step: maneuver made as part of progress toward a goal
subject: topic
theme
depicted object
guinea pig
substitute: put in the place of another
table: data arranged in rows and columns
throat: passage to the stomach and lungs
tie: finish a game with an equal number of points
title: championship
claim
heading
deed
deed of conveyance
legal document
title of respect
track: circular magnetic path on a disk
trade: skilled practice of a practical occupation
wind: coil the spring of a mechanism
